extendedInfo.description: Police Scanner 5-0 brings you more than 2,500 police, fire, rescue and other radio feeds over 3G or WiFi. You can search for channels in the U.S. and other countries by country, state or province and county. Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G/WiFi triangulation. You can save your favorites, listen in the background, and get instant access to new feeds as they come online. Use Police Scanner 5.0 to monitor exciting police, fire, and rescue frequencies, stay abreast of these activities in your area, and be prepared for disasters or other emergency situations. â It's like Jersey Shore, but not really. â Whether you like reality shows or hate them, you'll love listening in on real police, fire and rescue communications. Police Scanner 5.0 brings you more than 2,000 channels including public safety, air traffic, marine and amateur short-wave frequencies, all easily searchable. â Find sources close to you. â When you could hear your neighbors yelling over your own TV, you knew what they were up to. It's when they suddenly got quiet that you had to wonder. No more! With Police Scanner Radio, you'll know as soon as the authorities do! â Never boring! â Find channels with the most activity and listeners. Search U.S. feeds by state and county. Also search international feeds using Police Radio 5-0.Roger, Porkchop. Whut's yer 20? Learn new words, and new ways of combining familiar words. We were going to list this in the Education category, but everyone laughed. So here it is in Games. Seriously, though, check out the features: Critical Hit Software LLC makes no claim of any kind about the availability of any specific communications channel, frequency or data feed. Feeds are added and removed from time to time outside the control of Critical Hit Software LLC. Please see http://criticalhitsoftware.com/scanner_feeds.php for a sample list of feeds. FEATURES â More than 2,500 radio feeds delivered to you over 3G or WiFi â Simple, intuitive screens â Search U.S. and international channels by country, state and county â Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G triangulation â Save your favorite channels â Listen in the background as you use other apps â "10 Codes" and CB Lingo â Get instant access as new feeds come online

reviews.title: Easy
reviews.comment: Great app easy to use makes it the best free scanner on the web great
reviews.author: Tylet Burkett

reviews.comment: A whole lot of fun. The upgrade only required you to download 1 app and it could be free too. I did that and now no more interruptions. Great fun to listen too.
reviews.author: Gregory Colegrove

reviews.title: Gs3
reviews.comment: Great app very simple to use. I downloaded the app to get the full version and I really like the \"near me\" option. And the game I downloaded is very addicting. Great stuff guys. Keep it up
reviews.author: John Wilson

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: So far it has been great!! I\'ve not had any problems with this app yet.. Only if you would add fire and rescue on it.. I would then rate a five..
reviews.author: Brenda Bradshaw

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: Interrupted to much and kind of confusing..... it does work OK. Want 5 stars, make the necessary upgrades! Thank you and have a good day
reviews.author: Vincent King

reviews.title: A bunch of bull!
reviews.comment: The majority of united states police facilities are all switching to digital frequencies. The will all be swtched by aug, 1st 2013. So buying and downloading these appa are a waste of time, i\'ve been hunting n hunting for one thats digital and theres not a single digital all out there for us. So they\'ll take your money.
reviews.author: Terry Lechlitner

reviews.title: Easy
reviews.comment: Tha upgrade was easy to get, and works great. I live in Raytown, MO and I wouldn\'t expect them to cover this area. For easiest upgrade that\'s tha \"free\" one, I recommend tha \"complete 3 spins on Roulettist\" that\'s tha simplest one there is.
reviews.author: Donald Fisler

reviews.title: 5.0app
reviews.comment: An excellent app.you can listen to live streams of police.you can listen to a multi-tude of police precincts all across the usa.also you can tune into fire rescue stations across america.absolutely fantastic app.well done
reviews.author: Kenny Mason

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I love this app so much. My husband and i wanted to buy a police scanner from radioshack cuz we couldnt find a scanner that gets in our area. So happy i found this!
reviews.author: Amber Sena

reviews.comment: Ads to upgrade are way too frequent and interrupt the feed about every two minutes.  How can we decide if we want to upgrade if we can\'t use the app uninterrupted for more than two minutes?  Completely annoying.
reviews.author: Lee Kinney

reviews.title: The 411 of 911
reviews.comment: Keeps you in touch with what\'s going on around you. Wish that you could access all information around you such as police as well- living in a beach resort area with lots of bars it would come in handy. Otherwise great app, enjoy it
reviews.author: Dawn Waring McCaleb

reviews.title: Put together good and accurate
reviews.comment: Very dependable.  And easy. To use
reviews.author: Jeff Richardson

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: Finally found a scanner app that works well without interruption, is easy to use, and has my city (small town)  great app would def recommend it
reviews.author: alberto ciccola

reviews.title: ok.....
reviews.comment: Good app but needs more stations in Europe especially Ireland 5 stars if there is in the next update. Other than that its good but the ad\'s are too frequent fix these and I will give 5 stars and tell my friends about it.
reviews.author: Ben Donnelly

reviews.comment: nice selection of channels the only issue is it cuts out alot to pop up ad for paid version. slightly annoying
reviews.author: Dave Epstein

reviews.title: Live 24hr call...
reviews.comment: I love this scanner. .cos it helps me with my job. I use it for everyday 24hr emergency fire board up....I\'m ready. ..lets go!
reviews.author: Eddie Phelps

reviews.title: Sweet Program
reviews.comment: Keeps me up to date on what\'s going on when I hear a bar fight, see a car pulled over, hear the cops for flying by, an even if I spell smoke knowing its that time of the year...
reviews.author: Carrie Backes

reviews.title: Not sold on it yet.
reviews.comment: Would like the developer to answer my question .... \"Is the app supposed to shut down when my android phone screen times out or is it an end user dysfunction? \"
reviews.author: Greg W

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Won\'t even run long enough to hear if it is in my town!! Want you to pay right away. How about 2 days free to test out. Not 30 seconds.
reviews.author: Elliott Smith

reviews.title: Why free
reviews.comment: Why put this as free if every 10 sec your going to pop up and have us buy the upgrade and it boots u off when it does it I\'ve had a better one my ill find it
reviews.author: Lacey Slagle
